# Battle of Nowa Wieś (1831)

Congress Poland
|combatant2 =  Russian Empire
|commander1 = Józef Dwernicki
|commander2 = Cyprian Kreutz
|casualties2 = 200
|result = Polish victory
|campaignbox =
}}
The Battle of Nowa Wieś (; ) was fought on 19 February 1831 between an army of Polish rebels under Jozef Dwernicki and a Russian army under Cyprian Kreutz. The Polish rebels were victorious.
References
pl:Bitwa pod Nową Wsią
